title: Hoops Tonight - Suns blast Luka & Mavericks, Harden & Embiid struggle as Heat thrash 76ers in Game 5
itunes:title: Hoops Tonight - Suns blast Luka & Mavericks, Harden & Embiid struggle as Heat thrash 76ers in Game 5
description:
Jason Timpf reacts to Chris Paul, Devin Booker, and the Phoenix Suns' Game 5 rout of Luka Doncic and the Mavericks, pushing Dallas to the brink of elimination. He also discusses the poor performances of James Harden and Joel Embiid as the 76ers suffered an embarrassing 120-85 loss to Jimmy Butler and the Miami Heat. #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
